exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_compat_check d sigma = true

Premises:
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
signature = Map nat : Set
predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma end : preDTA -> signature -> bool
preDTA = Map state : Set
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
st_compat_check_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> st_compat_check s sigma = true
st_compat_check_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), st_compat_check s sigma = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma
dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta p _ => predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature -> bool
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
st_compat_check_0_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa
st_compat_check_0_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa -> st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true
states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (s s' : state), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma -> st_compatible s s'
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)
st_compat_check = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => st_compat_check_0 pre_ad_empty sigma s : state -> signature -> bool
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
st_compat_check_0 = fix st_compat_check_0 (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ a p => match pl_compat_check p with | Some n => match MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) with | Some m => n =? m | None => false end | None => false end | @M2 _ x y => st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x && st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_I pa) sigma y end : pre_ad -> signature -> state -> bool
invar_list = fun tl : term_list => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p tl n = true -> n <= m -> rec_list_terms d p tl m = true : term_list -> Prop
invar_term = fun t : term => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), rec_term d a t n = true -> n <= m -> rec_term d a t m = true : term -> Prop
sem_equiv_prop_l = fun l : term_list => forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p l n = true -> liste_reconnait d p l : term_list -> Prop
sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop
invar_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
semantic_equiv_0_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
semantic_equiv_1_4_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat), l <> tnil -> rec_list_terms d ls l n = true -> rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a la ls) l (S n) = true
semantic_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p l n = true
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
invar_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, rec_list_terms d p t n = true
invar_2_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) (S n) = true -> rec_list_terms d ls (tcons hd tl) n = true \/ rec_term d a hd n = true /\ rec_list_terms d la tl n = true
invar_2_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d ls (tcons hd tl) n = true \/ rec_term d a hd n = true /\ rec_list_terms d la tl n = true -> rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) (S n) = true

```coq
unfold predta_compat_check. induction d as [ | [ | s ] ]; auto.
+ reflexivity.
+ rewrite IHd1, IHd2; auto.
+ destruct s; try discriminate; auto.
+ eapply st_compat_check_correct; eauto.
+ eapply st_compat_check_complete; eauto.
+ eapply predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles; eauto.
+ eapply dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles; eauto.
+ eapply states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles; eauto.
+ eapply state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2; eauto.
+ eapply semantic_equiv_0_6; eauto.
+ eapply invar_list; eauto.
+ eapply invar_term; eauto.
+ eapply sem_equiv_prop_l; eauto.
+ eapply sem_equiv_prop_t; eauto.
+ eapply invar_2_0; eauto.
+ eapply semantic_equiv_0_0; eauto.
+ eapply semantic_equiv_0; eauto.
+ eapply semantic_equiv_1; eauto.
+ eapply semantic_equiv_1_4_0; eauto.
+ eapply semantic_equiv_0_2; eauto.
+ eapply invar_1_0; eauto.
+ eapply invar_1_1; eauto.
+ eapply invar_2_1; eauto.
+ eapply invar_2_2; eauto.
Qed.

original: unfold predta_compat_check. induction d as [ | [ | s ] ]; auto. + reflexivity. + rewrite IHd1, IHd2; auto. + destruct s; try discriminate; auto. + eapply st_compat_check_correct; eauto. + eapply st_compat_check_complete; eauto. + eapply predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles; eauto. + eapply dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles; eauto. + eapply states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles; eauto. + eapply state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2; eauto. + eapply semantic_equiv_0_6; eauto. + eapply invar_list; eauto. + eapply invar_term; eauto. + eapply sem_equiv_prop_l; eauto. + eapply sem_equiv_prop_t; eauto. + eapply invar_2_0; eauto. + eapply semantic_equiv_0_0; eauto. + eapply semantic_equiv_0; eauto. + eapply semantic_equiv_1; eauto. + eapply semantic_equiv_1_4_0; eauto. + eapply semantic_equiv_0_2; eauto. + eapply invar_1_0; eauto. + eapply invar_1_1; eauto. + eapply invar_2_1; eauto. + eapply invar_2_2; eauto.
